text: Lorna Laidlaw (born 1 February 1963) is an English actress and former children's television presenter. She is best known for her roles as Mrs. Tembe in the BBC One medical soap opera Doctors from 2011 to 2019 and Aggie Bailey in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 2019 onwards. Laidlaw also portrayed Miss Smiley in the CBeebies television programme Grandpa in My Pocket. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English television presenters Category:Actors from Birmingham
title: Lorna Laidlaw
